languages.text: "Любой арбитр знает, как не превратить подавление мятежа в еще больший мятеж. Ты же подошла к долгу не с холодной головой, а бурля ненавистью к еретикам — на твоем примере можно составлять пособие "Как делать не надо".

"Every Arbitrator is taught how to suppress a rebellion without starting a bigger one. Instead of doing your duty with a cool head, you let your seething hatred for heretics get the better of you — you will serve as a prime example of how not to do this job."
languages.original_text: "Любой арбитр знает, как не превратить подавление мятежа в еще больший мятеж. Ты же подошла к долгу не с холодной головой, а бурля ненавистью к еретикам — на твоем примере можно составлять пособие "Как делать не надо".

traits.locale_text: "Every Arbitrator is taught how to suppress a rebellion without starting a bigger rebellion. Instead of doing your duty with a cool head, you revelled in your seething hatred for heretics — you will serve as a prime example of the wrong way to do this job."

"Every Arbitrator is taught how to suppress a rebellion without starting a bigger rebellion. Instead of doing your duty with a cool head, you revelled in your seething hatred for heretics — you will serve as a prime example of the wrong way to do this job."

"Every Arbitrator is taught how to suppress a rebellion without starting a bigger one. Instead of doing your duty with a cool head, you let your seething hatred for heretics get the better of you — you will serve as a prime example of how not to do this job."

"Every Arbitrator is taught how to suppress a rebellion without starting a bigger one. Instead of doing your duty with a cool head, you let your seething hatred for heretics get the better of you — you will serve as a prime example of how not to do this job."

"Every Arbitrator is taught how to suppress a rebellion without starting a bigger one. Instead of doing your duty with a cool head, you let your seething hatred for heretics get the better of you — you will serve as a prime example of how not to do this job."

languages.text: “每位法务官都接受过训练，学习如何镇压叛乱，而不会引发更大规模的叛乱。你没有冷静地履行你的职责，而是任由对异端分子的仇恨驱使。在镇压叛乱这方面，你是个典型的反例。”
languages.original_text: "Every Arbitrator is taught how to suppress a rebellion without starting a bigger one. Instead of doing your duty with a cool head, you let your seething hatred for heretics get the better of you — you will serve as a prime example of how not to do this job."

traits.locale_text: “每位法务官都接受过训练，学习如何镇压叛乱，而不会引发更大规模的叛乱。你没有冷静地履行你的职责，而是任由对异端分子的仇恨驱使。在镇压叛乱这方面，你是个典型的反例。”

languages.text: «Todo Arbitrator aprende a sofocar una rebelión sin provocar una mayor. En vez de cumplir su deber con la cabeza fría, dejó que su odio por los herejes le superara. Es usted un ejemplo perfecto de cómo no desempeñar esta función».
languages.original_text: "Every Arbitrator is taught how to suppress a rebellion without starting a bigger one. Instead of doing your duty with a cool head, you let your seething hatred for heretics get the better of you — you will serve as a prime example of how not to do this job."

traits.locale_text: «Todo Arbitrator aprende a sofocar una rebelión sin provocar una mayor. En vez de cumplir su deber con la cabeza fría, dejó que su odio por los herejes le superara. Es usted un ejemplo perfecto de cómo no desempeñar esta función».

languages.text: « Tous les arbitrators sont formés à tuer dans l'œuf une rébellion sans en déclencher une autre. Au lieu d'accomplir votre devoir dans le calme, vous vous êtes laissée aveugler par votre haine envers les hérétiques : vous illustrez à merveille tout ce qu'il ne faut pas faire. »
languages.original_text: "Every Arbitrator is taught how to suppress a rebellion without starting a bigger one. Instead of doing your duty with a cool head, you let your seething hatred for heretics get the better of you — you will serve as a prime example of how not to do this job."

traits.locale_text: « Tous les arbitrators sont formés à tuer dans l'œuf une rébellion sans en déclencher une autre. Au lieu d'accomplir votre devoir dans le calme, vous vous êtes laissée aveugler par votre haine envers les hérétiques : vous illustrez à merveille tout ce qu'il ne faut pas faire. »

languages.text: 「すべてのアービトレイターは、より大きな反乱を引き起こさずに反乱を鎮圧する方法を教えられている。お前は冷静な頭で職務を全うする代わりに、異端者への激しい憎しみに飲まれてしまった。お前はこの仕事のやり方として絶対にやってはいけない見本となるだろう」
languages.original_text: "Every Arbitrator is taught how to suppress a rebellion without starting a bigger one. Instead of doing your duty with a cool head, you let your seething hatred for heretics get the better of you — you will serve as a prime example of how not to do this job."

traits.locale_text: 「すべてのアービトレイターは、より大きな反乱を引き起こさずに反乱を鎮圧する方法を教えられている。お前は冷静な頭で職務を全うする代わりに、異端者への激しい憎しみに飲まれてしまった。お前はこの仕事のやり方として絶対にやってはいけない見本となるだろう」

languages.text: "Her Yargıcı'ya, isyanı daha büyük bir isyan çıkarmadan nasıl bastıracağı öğretilir. Görevini soğuk kanlılıkla yapmak yerine kâfirlere duyduğun kaynayan nefretin seni ele geçirmesine izin verdin. Bu işin nasıl yapılmaması gerektiğine dair en iyi örnek sen olacaksın."
languages.original_text: "Every Arbitrator is taught how to suppress a rebellion without starting a bigger one. Instead of doing your duty with a cool head, you let your seething hatred for heretics get the better of you — you will serve as a prime example of how not to do this job."

traits.locale_text: "Her Yargıcı'ya isyanı daha büyük bir isyan çıkarmadan nasıl bastıracağı öğretilir. Görevini soğuk kanlılıkla yapmak yerine kâfirlere duyduğun kaynayan nefretin seni ele geçirmesine izin verdin. Bu işin nasıl yapılmaması gerektiğine dair en iyi örnek sen olacaksın."

languages.text: "Jeder Arbitrator lernt, wie man eine Rebellion unterdrückt, ohne eine noch größere auszulösen. Statt mit kühlem Kopf Eure Pflicht zu erfüllen, habt Ihr Euch von Eurem brodelnden Hass auf Ketzer vereinnahmen lassen – Ihr werdet als Musterbeispiel dafür dienen, wie man diese Arbeit nicht macht."
languages.original_text: "Every Arbitrator is taught how to suppress a rebellion without starting a bigger one. Instead of doing your duty with a cool head, you let your seething hatred for heretics get the better of you — you will serve as a prime example of how not to do this job."

traits.locale_text: "Jeder Arbitrator lernt, wie man eine Rebellion unterdrückt, ohne eine noch größere auszulösen. Statt mit kühlem Kopf Eure Pflicht zu erfüllen, habt Ihr Euch von Eurem brodelnden Hass auf Ketzer vereinnahmen lassen – Ihr werdet als Musterbeispiel dafür dienen, wie man diese Arbeit nicht macht."
